= Soar Data Collector = 
A Java library that can be used to collect data from a running Soar environment. 

=== Download Links ===
  * You can download the SDC [https://github.com/voigtjr/soar-datacollector here].
  
=== Documentation ===
  * A commented example can be found [https://github.com/voigtjr/soar-datacollector/blob/master/src/main/java/edu/umich/soar/DataCollectorExample.java here].
  
=== Developer ===
  * Jonathan Voigt  <voigtjr@gmail.com>

=== Soar Versions ===
  * Latest version of Soar
  
=== Language ===
  * Java
